summary: Implements a configurable inference pipeline that combines automatic speech recognition (ASR) and voice activity detection (VAD). It accepts either a manifest file or a directory of audio files, loads NeMo ASR and VAD models, optionally applies feature masking or dropping based on RTTM files, supports profiling, and outputs transcriptions and VAD segments.
business_intent: Enable automated transcription and speech activity analysis for audio datasets, supporting flexible preprocessing and model selection to streamline data labeling, content indexing, and speech analytics workflows.
